history.proof: intros n m p H. hauto use: N.mul_lt_mono_pos_l, Nmult_lt_compat_rev_l1.

exceptions.tactic: apply (N.lt_le_trans (N.mul p n) (N.mul p m) n).
exceptions.exn: In environment n, m, p : N H : p * n < p * m Unable to unify "p * n < n" with "n < m".
In environment n, m, p : N H : p * n < p * m Unable to unify "(?M1412 * ?M1410 ?= ?M1412 * ?M1411) = Lt" with "(n ?= m) = Lt".
In environment n, m, p : N H : p * n < p * m Unable to unify "p * n < p * m" with "n < m".
In environment n, m, p : N H : p * n < p * m Unable to unify "1 < p" with "n < m".
In environment n, m, p : N H : p * n < p * m Unable to unify "p * n < p * m" with "n < m".

original: intros n m p H. apply (N.lt_le_trans (N.mul p n) (N.mul p m) n). apply Nmult_lt_compat_l. - apply H. - apply (N.lt_1_l' n m p). + apply H. + apply N.lt_transitive with (m := N.mul p m); auto.
